title: Asgaard Sofa
description: Setting the bar as one of the loudest speakers in its class, the Asgaard Sofa is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well-balanced audio sound which boosts a clear midrange and extended highs for a balanced experience.
longDescription: Embodying the raw, wayward spirit of rock 'n' roll, the Asgaard Sofa is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well-balanced design which boosts clear midrange and extended highs for sound that is both articulate and pronounced. The analogue knobs allow you to fine-tune the controls to your personal preferences, while the guitar-influenced leather strap enables easy and stylish transport.
